short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension to push Articles on git repositories in a readable markdown format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MarkPUSH is a web-clipper which uses git-repositories as storage. It perform basic operations such as clone, commit, push to automatically contribute into a git based repository.

Features:

- Converts a Website Article into a simple markdown file
- Manages git operations to PUSH the markdown files into any repository
- Download associated images of the article in sub-directory
